issue.title: getpocket.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://getpocket.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgetpocket.com%2F) ### Comment > Mozilla Pocket showing as logged out and unable to log in. Even if you log in before enabling ADGUARD it will still show as logged out. Pocket will return to normal upon deactivation of ad blocking. > > Steps to Reproduce: > 1. Turn on ADGUARD > 2. Go to https://getpocket.com/ > 3. Turn off ADGUARD Username: `@agidney` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/43tuekky4fc4s44wo840ok04ocww84wbmngdyvlils.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/kcjuwlc3gsg4k4ogo0sksoso8804k8w2cdnblc0mmo.png?nc=1)

Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Block trackers Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
